mapper.select: select board.*, co_name as bo_co_name, sum(case when re_state = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as bo_up, sum(case when re_state = -1 then 1 else 0 end) as bo_down from board join community on co_num = bo_co_num left join recommend on re_bo_num = bo_num group by bo_num order by bo_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
